name: Save your eggs
description:
This was a project for Miz Jam 1

This is a small tower defense game, were you have to defend a point from evil monsters trying to steal your hard earned eggs. As the farmer you must run around and collect your farm animals to help you defend off the monsters.  All animals are different from another!

rooster/hen - Normal Damage, Normal Range.

Cow - Low Damage, High Range.

Pig - High Damage, Low Range.

Horse - Boost Player Speed!

This was made it 32 hours, and this is my first project I've posted online, any and all feedback is welcome and appreciated!

Thank you!
